meanings.sent1: She is tenanting the apartment downtown.
meanings.sent2: They will be tenanting the house next month.
meanings.sent3: Tenanting the cozy cottage brought her joy.
meanings.sent4: He was tenanting the office space like a busy bee.
meanings.sent5: Tenanting the historic building felt like a dream come true.

meanings.definition: The action of occupying a property as a tenant.
meanings.sent1: The tenanting of the apartment was smooth.
meanings.sent2: His tenanting of the house was temporary.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tenanting of the doghouse was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The tenanting of the old mansion was a tale of mystery.
meanings.sent5: Her tenanting of the beachfront villa was envied by all.
